stories.text: https://offshoots.io - A site that automates making a difference for our planet every time you take out the trash. We put an average of 40lbs of CO2 into the air for every pound of trash that gets put into a landfill. It's time to do something about it, and this project aims to do just that. Completely automated, super simple.

stories.text:
My browser (mobile safari) displays a blank page when going to https://www.notion.so/pathfinance/Fullstack-Engineer-Path-YC-S19-ff0fd31fa5d4410dafce77f83403ce0d

Since I do not know of a way to (meta)discuss YC job submissions on this forum—-
